snippet: A group offers instructional videos on slipping through station gates without paying, and it uses monthly dues to cover fines for any members who are nabbed.
abstract: Swedish group known as Planka.nu offers instructional videos on how to slip through subway stations in Stockholm without paying, and it uses monthly dues to covers fines for any members who are nabbed; transit officials say organization has helped lead many thousands of riders to simply stop paying fares; 15 million trips in 2013 were reportedly not paid for--3 percent of all rides.
lead_paragraph: A group offers instructional videos on slipping through station gates without paying, and it uses monthly dues to cover fines for any members who are nabbed.

headline.main: Fare Dodging Is an Organized Rebellion in Stockholm, and It’s Winning
headline.print_headline: Fare Dodging Is an Organized Rebellion in Stockholm, and It’s Winning
